title: ‘Coz You Only Live Once: Geraint Thomas Targets Career-First Giro d’Italia-Tour de France Double
content:
'A massive challenge': Soon-to-be-retired warhorse to make Strade Bianche debut and join Pogačar in targeting cycling's most troubling double in 2024.

Read the full article at ‘Coz You Only Live Once: Geraint Thomas Targets Career-First Giro d’Italia-Tour de France Double on Velo.
author: Jim Cotton
